title: 300k Golem Morph, who's going for it?

replies.body: I need to take out a loan in First National Bank of Avicus to pay for this :( and work all my life on this loan.
replies.body_tagged: I need to take out a loan in First National Bank of Avicus to pay for this :( and work all my life on this loan.

replies.body: The bank just got back to me, sadly they couldn't fund my requests> they said something about a Ms. Clinton and taking 140,000 credits from my account to fund her political campaign. Too bad it didn't work out. I have now sued Hilary and told her to go eat a rotten tomato as taking my credits in a block game is simply unexceptable.
